title: Raised Bars, Or Breaking into Tech
description: Image by tsykoduk As we make things more complex, do we make things better? Are we lowering the bar to entry or raising it? How do folks break into the market today? How do they pick up the skills that they need? How can we ensure that everyone has a chance to explore?
